title: sakala nanmaigaLum
sahitya:
sakala nanmaigaLum nI taravENum ayyA svAminAthan enra pugazh perum murugayyA


anupallavi

  pagalum iravum un padamalar manam vaittEn parangiriyAn jnAna pazhaiyangiri vElA


caraNam    tiruttaNigai malaiyAr tiruccenduUr patiyAr tiruppazham udir shOlai tigazhndiDum vElayyA
dharumam shiva karumam tavarAdavarkkenrum dhanam kalvi tandALum Sanmukhak-kumarayyA
